title: A bill to increase the mortgage loan limits under the National Housing Act for multifamily housing mortgage insurance.
content: FHA Multifamily Housing Mortgage Loan Limit Adjustment Act of 2001 - Amends the National Housing Act to increase multifamily project mortgage loan limits for: (1) rental housing, (2) cooperative housing, (3) rehabilitation and neighborhood conservation housing, (4) housing for moderate income and displaced families, (5) housing for the elderly, and (6) condominiums.
